thread.title: Former Chicago schools chief to plead guilty Tuesday, source says
thread.title_full: Former Chicago schools chief to plead guilty Tuesday, source says

title: Former Chicago schools chief to plead guilty Tuesday, source says
text:
Former Chicago schools chief to plead... Former Chicago schools chief to plead guilty Tuesday, source says Next Story Prev Story 22 min ago Read more: Chicago Tribune 
Former Chicago Public Schools CEO Barbara Byrd-Bennett is expected to plead guilty Tuesday to charges she steered multimillion-dollar no-bid contracts to an education consulting firm in exchange for kickbacks and other perks she thought would net her at least $2.3 million, a source said. Byrd-Bennett is set to appear before U.S. District Judge Edmond Chang for her arraignment at 10 a.m. The judge would have to make sure Byrd-Bennett is competent to enter a guilty plea so early in the proceedings, and would have to approve any plea deal. Start the conversation, or Read more at Chicago Tribune.
